bibliographic-data.invention-title: METHOD AND ARRANGEMENTS FOR DISPLAYING AN EGM BONUS FEATURE

abstract.p: A method of incorporating a bonus symbol into a plurality of symbols to be displayed in an EGM display adapted to display at least a selected portion of a plurality of standard symbols, the method including the steps of: determining the number of bonus symbols to be displayed (504)
for each bonus symbol to be displayed: determining the location at which the bonus symbol is to be displayed within the plurality of symbols (506)
incorporating a bonus symbol with the corresponding standard symbol for the chosen location (506)
whereby the bonus symbol is incorporated into the plurality of symbols without affecting the standard symbol probabilities.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: A bonus feature for gaming machines that is associated with an ordinary symbol and retains the standard odds

abstract.p: A method of enhancing an underlying symbol display game having a plurality of symbol locations (602, 604, 606), each symbol location including a displayable symbol and the game being provided using the display of an electronic gaming machine. In the underlying game, a number of symbols are chosen to be displayed in the symbol locations and winning or losing is based on the arrangement of these symbols. Each symbol has a predetermined probability of being displayed in the symbol locations. The method comprises the steps of: a) selecting a probability for the display of one or more bonus symbols (707) to be incorporated into the underlying symbol display game, over the course of play of one or more consecutive games, wherein the display of one or more bonus symbols at the conclusion of a game causes a bonus outcome

and b) determining a number of bonus symbols that need to be incorporated into the underlying symbol display game for each of said one or more consecutive games to meet said selected probability. Prior to commencing each game, and for each of said determined number of bonus symbols that need to be incorporated, the method includes: a) selecting one of said symbol locations

and b) incorporating said bonus symbol in said selected symbol location with the respective displayable symbol, wherein the incorporation of each of said determined number of bonus symbols has no effect upon the predetermined probability for the underlying symbol display game.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: A METHOD AND ARRANGEMENT FOR DISPLAYING AN EGM BONUS FEATURE
PROCÉDÉ ET DISPOSITION D'AFFICHAGE D'UN BONUS D'UN APPAREIL ÉLECTRONIQUE DE JEU DE HASARD

abstract.p: A method of incorporating a bonus symbol into a plurality of symbols to be displayed in an EGM display adapted to display at least a selected portion of a plurality of standard symbols, the method including the steps of: determining the number of bonus symbols to be displayed (504)
for each bonus symbol to be displayed: determining the location at which the bonus symbol is to be displayed within the plurality of symbols (506)
incorporating a bonus symbol with the corresponding standard symbol for the chosen location (506)
whereby the bonus symbol is incorporated into the plurality of symbols without affecting the standard symbol probabilities.

La présente invention concerne un procédé d'incorporation d'un symbole de bonus dans une pluralité de symboles à afficher sur un écran d'appareil de jeu électronique de hasard adapté à l'affichage d'au moins une partie choisie d'une pluralité de symboles standard
ce procédé comprend les étapes suivantes : détermination du nombre de symboles de bonus à afficher (504)
pour chaque symbole de bonus à afficher : détermination de l'endroit où le symbole de bonus doit être affiché à l'intérieur de la pluralité de symboles (506)
incorporation d'un symbole de bonus avec le symbole standard correspondant pour l'emplacement choisi (506)
dans ce cas le symbole de bonus est intégré dans la pluralité de symboles sans affecter les probabilités de symboles standards.
